籤詩版本二:
Khalani aulemu ndi aulemu polowa ndi kutuluka, khalani okhulupirika ndi odalirika, ndipo mverani mawu anu.
Malingaliro samveka bwino komanso odekha, dzuwa lofiira kwambiri liri pakati
詩意:
Hexagram iyi ikuyimira chifaniziro cha dzuwa lofiira likuwala kumwamba.
Chilichonse chimayenda monga momwe anakonzera.
解曰: Palibe kalikonse mu malingaliro. Madzi a autumn ndi oyera. Palibe chifukwa chokayikira. Zinthu zimachitika mwachibadwa.
籤詩故事一:
◇Taoyuan kulumbira ubale
Kumapeto kwa Ufumu wa Kum’mawa kwa Han, dziko linali m’chipwirikiti, ndipo mbava za Yellow Turban zinkayambitsa chipwirikiti kulikonse.
Liu Bei, Guan Yu ndi Zhang Fei, anthu atatu okhala ndi malingaliro apamwamba, anali ndi malingaliro ofanana ndipo amadalirana m'mawu ndi zochita zawo kuti akwaniritse cholinga chachikulu pamodzi. (tsopano Songlindian Town, Mzinda wa Zhuozhou, m’chigawo cha Hebei) m’nyengo imene maluwa a pichesi anali atayamba kuphuka kwambiri. za kutsitsimutsa Mzera wa Han. Atatuwo anakhala abale olumbirira, ndipo unali Marichi ndipo maluwa a pichesi anali atachita maluwa.
聖意: Chitetezo chapakhomo, chuma, chuma, zovuta zamalonda, ukwati, zoopsa, oyenda pansi akutsekereza minda, mphutsi za silika, ziweto, anthu osowa, milandu, kutaya, kusamuka, kusunga katundu, kutayika, matenda, kukhazikitsa, kutumiza kumanda amapiri, zabwino zonse.
第X籤: Makumi atatu ndi anayi akupambana lottery (maere)
